title: datastew
description: Datastew is a Python library for intelligent data harmonization using Large Language Model (LLM) vector embeddings.

creators.name: Adams, Tim
creators.affiliation: Fraunhofer Institute for Algorithms and Scientific Computing SCAI

creators.name: Ay, Mehmet Can
creators.affiliation: Fraunhofer Institute for Algorithms and Scientific Computing SCAI

notes:
If you use this software, please cite it as:
Salimi, Y., Adams, T., Ay, M. C., Balabin, H., Jacobs, M., & Hofmann-Apitius, M. (2024). On the utility of large language model embeddings for revolutionizing semantic data harmonization in Alzheimer’s and Parkinson’s disease. Scientific Reports. https://doi.org/10.21203/rs.3.rs-4108029/v1
